member.summary: Server is going down or a browser have navigated away from a page.

member.summary: Received unexpected data type (text versus binary).

member.summary: Received inconsistent data (such as non-UTF-8 data within a text message).

member.summary: Message was too big to be processed.

member.summary: Mandatory extension is missing (only sent by clients).
